thread.title: Penton's Aviation Week Network Names Rob Howlett as Regional Account ManagerTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Penton's Aviation Week Network Names Rob Howlett as Regional Account ManagerTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Penton's Aviation Week Network Names Rob Howlett as Regional Account ManagerTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Penton’s Aviation Week Network Names Rob Howlett as Regional Account Manager  
Penton’s Aviation Week Network, the largest multimedia information and services provider for the global aviation, aerospace and defense industries, announced today that marketing and media executive Rob Howlett has joined its media sales team as a Regional Sales Manager. Howlett will cover the organization’s Southeast territory, representing key clients including Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman and L-3.Penton veteran Howlett, who has been with the company for 25 years, moves to Aviation Week from the organization’s Manufacturing & Supply Chain and Penton Public Sector divisions, where he developed custom marketing services solutions for a variety of brands and websites.
 
Howlett is a 10-time winner of Penton’s coveted Salesperson of the Year Award. He is also a Dale Carnegie Sales Training Program Assistant Instructor and a graduate of The Ohio State University.
 
 
“Rob’s extensive experience and knowledge of the manufacturing supply chain will be an asset to the Aviation Week Network’s media portfolio,” says Beth Wagner, Managing Director of the Americas. “We are thrilled to have him onboard in this capacity.”
 
Source:-Penton’s Aviation
